analysis.key_quote: Do not enact this! Measures that move important civil service work over to “at will” employment invariably reduce the quality of said work.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of maintaining independent civil service work and expressing concern that reclassifying positions to 'at will' employment would diminish the quality of work, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
